metadata.title: CVE-2024-35918 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:randomize_kstack: Improve entropy diffusionThe kstack_offset variable was really only ever using the low bits forkernel stack offset entropy. Add a ror32() to increase bit diffusion.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
